name: FTP3DS
body:
### FTP3DS.
On this page you can find some basic info on FTP3DS as well as the download and source links above.

### Introduction
FTP3DS is a fork of [mtheall's](https://www.github.com/mtheall/) [FTPD](https://github.com/mtheall/ftpd) that uses buildtools and thus allows for a single `make` in the project directory even when on vanilla DevkitARM / CTRULib.

### Features
- Works well with a variety of clients.

- Supports multiple simultaneous clients. The 3DS itself only appears to support enough sockets to perform 4-5 simultaneous data transfers, so it will help if you limit your FTP client to this many parallel requests.

### Building
------------------
Install and set up [devkitARM and libctru](http://3dbrew.org/wiki/Setting_up_Development_Environment). 

Clone this repository and cd in the resulting directory. Then run the following command:

`make`

This will create the `/output` folder with all required files.

### Authors and Contributors
@mtheall for all his great work on FTPD. This project would never ever exist without.

@steveice10 for his work on bannertool, project_ctr and through that also buildtools.

@usagirei for his great help for switching from ctrulib make to buildtools make as well as tracking down a bug in bannertool.

### Support or Contact
Contact me on [Twitter @Favna_](https://twitter.com/favna_) or create an [issue on github](https://github.com/Favna/FTP3DS/issues)
